body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours              Public Canal Boat Programs       Take a leisurely ride on a replica canal boat and experience history first hand. Great Falls offers mule-drawn rides on an 1870's packet boat. Williamsport provides rides on a 1920's electric launch boat. Click on the following links for more information Great Falls Canal Boat Williamsport Launch Boat
title: Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park: Guided Tours
